description: This file sets up an advanced FastAPI application with multiple agents and a research team, configuring their models, tools, storage, and interactions.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an autonomous agent with specific roles, models, tools, and storage.

classes.name: FastAPIApp
classes.description: Encapsulates the FastAPI application setup with agents and teams.

classes.name: Memory
classes.description: Handles in-memory or database-backed storage for agent state.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model wrapper for OpenAI's chat models.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Represents a team of agents with shared goals and configurations.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: Tools for web search via DuckDuckGo.

classes.name: ExaTools
classes.description: Tools for data analysis or external data access.

classes.name: YFinanceTools
classes.description: Tools for accessing financial data via Yahoo Finance.

methods.name: serve
methods.description: Starts the FastAPI server with specified app and port.
